resources.string: Sorry, there is already an existing wallet located in your phone.
Sorry, the following directory does not exist
Sorry, the following wallet password is incorrect. Please try again
Sorry, no wallet file has been detected in your phone, please create one and load afterwards
If you already have an instance of online wallet, that online wallet will be overwritten by the system. Please also make sure that you have at least 10 GWEI in your offline wallet before proceeding
Your Online Wallet has been deployed to the blokchain network! You may now use the full features of this application
There was an error when trying to deploy your online wallet! Please make sure that you have good internet connection and try again at a later time!
Make sure that you have enough balance in the wallet to register a transfer
Make sure that you have enough balance in your offline wallet to deposit funds to the online contract
Error creating transction, reverting back to main layout
The following transaction has been safely recorded, redirecting to the main menu
Are you sure you want to delete the following transaction from the queue?
The following transaction has been deleted from the queue. Redirecting to transaction history layout
Failed to delete transaction, please try again later

There was an error signing the following transaction. Either the current transaction has been signed by the current account, or an invalid address is trying to sign a transaction that is not authorized
The following transaction has been signed by the current account
Success requesting signature for the transaction!
The following transaction has been signed by the Key Provider
The following transaction details cannot be loaded, please make sure you have good internet connection!
Do you wish to proceed login out of your session?

These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement made between you, whether personally or on behalf of an entity (“you”) and DEHAB.Inc (“we,” “us” or “our”), concerning your access to and use of the DEHAB mobile application as well as any other media form, media channel, mobile website or mobile application related, linked, or otherwise connected thereto. 

You agree that by clicking the button, you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all of these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with all of these Terms of Service, then you are expressly prohibited from using the application and you must discontinue use immediately.

Once agreement of the tos has been read and accepted through the action of clicking the button below, an instance of smart contract that will be used as your online wallet will be sent to the blockchain and will be used throughout the application.

The information provided on this mobile application is not intended for distribution to or use by any person or entity in any jurisdiction or country where such distribution or use would be contrary to law or regulation or which would subject us to any registration requirement within such jurisdiction or country.

Accordingly, those persons who choose to access the mobile application from other locations do so on their own initiative and are solely responsible for compliance with local laws, if and to the extent local laws are applicable.

These Terms of Service were generated by DEHAB.Inc Law Team.
